name: Duke Nukem

write_file.content:
[sdl]
sensitivity=30
[autoexec]
@echo off
mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir
C:
CD DUKE
cls
ECHO Duke Nukem Pack---------------------------
ECHO ------------------------------------------
ECHO 1) Duke Nukem Ep.1: Sharpnel City
ECHO 2) Duke Nukem Ep.2: Mission: Moonbase
ECHO 3) Duke Nukem Ep.3: Trapped in the Future
ECHO ------------------------------------------
ECHO 4) exit program
ECHO ------------------------------------------
choice /c1234 /s Which game do you want to run? [1-4]: /n
if errorlevel 4 goto exit
if errorlevel 3 goto e3
if errorlevel 2 goto e2
if errorlevel 1 goto e1
:e1
@echo off
dn1.exe
exit
:e2
@echo off
dn2.exe
exit
:e3
@echo off
dn3.exe
exit
:exit
exit

content:
files:
- game: N/A:Select GOG installer.
- inno: https://lutris.nyc3.digitaloceanspaces.com/tools/innoextract/innoextract-1.8-dev-2019-01-13-linux.tar.xz
game:
  main_file: $GAMEDIR/duke-nukem.conf
installer:
- extract:
    dst: $CACHE
    file: $inno
- execute:
    args: -I app -d "$CACHE" "$game"
    file: $CACHE/innoextract
- execute:
    args: $GAMEDIR/HDD $GAMEDIR/HDD/DUKE
    file: mkdir
- merge:
    dst: $GAMEDIR/HDD/DUKE
    src: $CACHE/app
- write_file:
    content: '[sdl]

      sensitivity=30

      [autoexec]

      @echo off

      mount C "$GAMEDIR/HDD" -t dir

      C:

      CD DUKE

      cls

      ECHO Duke Nukem Pack---------------------------

      ECHO ------------------------------------------

      ECHO 1) Duke Nukem Ep.1: Sharpnel City

      ECHO 2) Duke Nukem Ep.2: Mission: Moonbase

      ECHO 3) Duke Nukem Ep.3: Trapped in the Future

      ECHO ------------------------------------------

      ECHO 4) exit program

      ECHO ------------------------------------------

      choice /c1234 /s Which game do you want to run? [1-4]: /n

      if errorlevel 4 goto exit

      if errorlevel 3 goto e3

      if errorlevel 2 goto e2

      if errorlevel 1 goto e1

      :e1

      @echo off

      dn1.exe

      exit

      :e2

      @echo off

      dn2.exe

      exit

      :e3

      @echo off

      dn3.exe

      exit

      :exit

      exit'
    file: $GAMEDIR/duke-nukem.conf
